div.p: [… give/furnish (?)] to those indicated below for fodder ration of their horses ⟨for⟩ 3 months [from Tybi] to Pham(enoth) inclusive, daily for each horse [1/2] am(ma) of green fodder, thusly: to Pharismanios, spatharius, for fodder ration of his 2 horses for 3 months, 45 am(mata) of fodder for each horse, total 90 am(mata) of green fodder; to Konon, in (sic) Pham(enoth), for 3 months, for his fodder ration, 4[5] am(mata) of green fodder, (2nd hand) grand total of green fodder, 135 am(mata) only. Written Tybi 4, 6th indiction. † Of green fodder, one hundred thirty-five amm(ata), Tybi 4, sixth indiction. Fl(avius) Christodot(os), most brilliant count, through me, Ioannes, grain-measurer. Translation: J.G. Keenan, ZPE 193 (2015) 246
